Field Detail

src_test_pack

public final PhpUnitSourceTestPack src_test_pack

bootstrap_file

public final java.io.File bootstrap_file
optional: a PHP file to load at the start of every PhpUnit test. Often, this will be an autoloader that loads all the required include files so you don't have to specify them here. copy this from the bootstrap= attribute in PhpUnit.xml.dist

path

public final java.io.File path
required: the base directory for tests. this is scanned for *Test.php files unless subdirectories are provided. if subdirectories are provided, they are assumed to be inside this directory. copy this from the dir= attribute in PhpUnit.xml.dist

See Also:
addSubDir(java.lang.String)

subdirs

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> subdirs

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> globals

addIncludeFile

public PhpUnitDist addIncludeFile(java.lang.String file)
add an included file. copy this from the >file< tags from the XML file. these will be added to require_once statements in the PhpUnit test case.

Parameters:
file -
Returns:

addWhitelist

public PhpUnitDist addWhitelist(java.lang.String test_name)
adds tests to whitelist. if whitelist is not empty, only matching tests will be run copy this from the >whitelist< tag in PhpUnit.xml.dist

Parameters:
test_name -
Returns:

addBlacklist

public PhpUnitDist addBlacklist(java.lang.String test_name)
adds tests to blacklist. no matching test will be run copy this from the >blacklist< tag in PhpUnit.xml.dist

Parameters:
test_name -
Returns:

addSubDir

public PhpUnitDist addSubDir(java.lang.String dir)
provide a subdirectory. if any subdirectories are provided, those are the ONLY directories that are scanned for *Test.php files (which are in turn scanned for PhpUnit tests) these directories must be inside the #path directory copy this from the >subdir< tag in PhpUnit.xml.dist

Parameters:
dir -
Returns:

addConstant

public PhpUnitDist addConstant(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String value)
adds a PHP constant to run with the tests (name and value to pass to PHP's define() function) copy this from the >const< tag in PhpUnit.xml.dist

Parameters:
name -
value -

addVar

public PhpUnitDist addVar(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String value)
adds a global variable to define in $GLOBALS in the PhpUnit test copy this from the >var< tag in PhpUnit.xml.dist

Parameters:
name -
value -
